Objector About

Topics To Consider in User Interface Design

September 18, 2019

User Interface Design covers a variety of topics and a multitude of disciplines which is why it is classified as a interdisciplinary career field.

The following are topics that relate directly or indirectly to UI design and should be looked at in order to gain a deeper insight into the field of study:

** Principles of Design: **

1. Principles of Gestalt
2. Negative Space
3. Contrast
4. Color Theory
5. Typography
6. Grids
7. Graphic Design

Other Topics to Consider:

User Centered Design

Anthropology

Sociology

Psychology

Cognitive Science

Digital Behavior

Neuroscience

Fine Art

Art History

Industrial Design

Interaction Design

Motion Design

Animation

Illustration

Iconography

Advertising

Creative Writing

Coding

Photography

Genre Theory

Designing for Accessibility

Information Architecture

Political Science

Behavioral Economics

Linguistics

Philosophy

Affective Science

Applied Research

Ubiquitous Computing

Data Visualization

Human-Computer Interaction

Web Form Design
